import React, { Component, Fragment } from 'react'; import Navbar from '../UI/Navbar-old'; import dudley from '../../assets/Joyce_Dudley.jpg' import news from '../../data/news'; import press from '../../data/press'; import covid from '../../assets/covid-banner.png' import backdrop from '../../assets/backdrop.jpeg' import victim from '../../assets/victim.png' import team from '../../assets/team.jpeg' import court from '../../assets/court calendar.jpeg' import faq from '../../assets/faq.jpg' import diversion from '../../assets/diversion.jpeg' import office from '../../assets/Office.png' import './Home.css'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; class Home extends Component { render () { let pressData = press.slice(0, 10); let newsData = news.slice(0, 10); return (
Our Mission
To pursue truth and justice by employing the highest ethical standards in vigorously prosecuting the guilty, protecting the innocent, and preventing crime.
Meet Your DA
Joyce E. Dudley
District Attorney
Covid Update
In order to help protect the health and safety of our community, the District Attorney's Office is closed to the public until further notice.
If this is an emergency call 911. Otherwise, please call to schedule an appointment for the following.
Victim Services
Santa Barbara: (805) 568-2400
Santa Maria: (805) 568-2400
SM / Juvenile: (805) 568-2400
Restitution Payment
Santa Barbara: (805) 568-2400
Santa Maria: (805) 568-2400
SM / Juvenile: (805) 568-2400
Discovery Pickup
Santa Barbara: (805) 568-2400
Santa Maria: (805) 568-2400
SM / Juvenile: (805) 568-2400
Main Reception
Santa Barbara: (805) 568-2400
Santa Maria: (805) 568-2400
SM / Juvenile: (805) 568-2400
What does your DA's Office do?
Our mission is to pursue truth and justice by employing the highest ethical standards in vigorously prosecuting the guilty, protecting the innocent, and preventing crime.
) } } export default Home;
